item.title: Stay Tuned for the Technological Transformation of Governance - Singularity HUB
item.description:
Stay Tuned for the Technological Transformation of Governance - Singularity HUB

3077 2 For a decade or more, many people have understood that educational technologies are likely to change how we teach and how our schools work. People can also see how medical technologies will impact the health care system or our own wellness. But technologies that transform governance are neither as widely discussed nor as well understood.
